statement.p: A contractor finds that Crew A takes \displaystyle{6.50} hours to construct a retaining wall and Crew B can do the same job in \displaystyle{9.50} hours. If Crew A and Crew B work together, how long will it take them to construct the retaining wall?
Round using the rules of significant figures.
You may find it useful to know the work formula is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{a}}+\frac{{1}}{{b}}=\frac{{1}}{{t}} .
Working together, the two crews will construct the wall in hours.
